title: Discord
description: The UltraStar/Vocaluxe/Performous Community on Discord. Many developer, song creators and users are active there and happy to help with any problems related to the game and all open source karaoke game related things.

title: Wiki
description: You can find some nice and helpful articles in our GitHub-wiki. Feel free to improve it, if something is missing.

title: Open Music Games
description: Central hub of open music games, started in 2022. Many helpful links and information.
